left.name: donor_submitter_id
left.description: Unique identifier for donor; assigned by data provider

right.name: donor_submitter_id
right.description: Unique identifier for donor; assigned by data provider

schemas.name: sample_registration
schemas.description: Collection of elements required to register the required Donor-Specimen-Sample data to the ARGO Platform. Registration of samples is required before genomic and clinical data submission can proceed.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Description of the donor self-reported gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: specimen_tissue_source
fields.description: Tissue source of the biospecimen.

fields.name: tumour_normal_designation
fields.description: Description of specimens tumour/normal status for data processing.

fields.name: specimen_type
fields.description: Description of the kind of specimen that was collected with respect to tumour/normal tissue origin.

codeList: Normal - tissue adjacent to primary tumour
Metastatic tumour - metastasis local to lymph node
Metastatic tumour - metastasis to distant location
Xenograft - derived from tumour cell line
Cell line - derived from xenograft tumour

fields.name: submitter_sample_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sample, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: sample_type
fields.description: Description of the type of molecular sample used for testing.

schemas.name: donor
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in a specific ICGC-ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Donors last known state of living or deceased.
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Description of the cause of a donor's death.
fields.name: cause_of_death

fields.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
fields.name: survival_time

schemas.name: primary_diagnosis
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's primary diagnosis. The primary diagnosis is the first diagnosed case of cancer in a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: age_at_diagnosis
fields.description: Age that the donor was first diagnosed with cancer, in years.

fields.name: cancer_type_code
fields.description: The code to represent the cancer type using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2016/en#/) classification.

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of primary diagnosis (prior to treatment).

fields.name: clinical_stage_group
fields.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

fields.name: stage_suffix
fields.description: If necessary, use this field to add any applicable stage suffixes. Stage suffixes may apply to certain staging systems such as Ann Arbour staging system where the four stages are divided into 4 categories (A, B, X and E).

fields.name: clinical_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: clinical_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: clinical_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

fields.name: number_lymph_nodes_examined
fields.description: The total number of lymph nodes tested for the presence of cancer.

fields.name: presenting_symptoms
fields.description: Indicate presenting symptoms at time of primary diagnosis.

fields.name: menopause_status
fields.description: Indicate the menopause status of the patient at the time of primary diagnosis.

schemas.name: specimen
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's specimen. A specimen is any material sample taken for testing, diagnostic or research purposes.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: specimen_acquisition_interval
fields.description: Interval between primary diagnosis and specimen acquisition, in days.

fields.name: anatomic_location_of_specimen_collection
fields.description: Anatomic location of a specimen when it was collected.

fields.name: central_pathology_confirmed
fields.description: Indicate whether the histologic description of tissue or cells was confirmed by a pathology review of frozen or formalin fixed slide(s) completed after the diagnostic pathology review of the tumour sample used to extract analyte(s).

fields.name: tumour_histological_type
fields.description: The code to represent the histology (morphology) of neoplasms that is usually obtained from a pathology report, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3).

fields.name: tumour_grading_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the description of a tumour based on how abnormal the tumour cells and the tumour tissue look under a microscope. Tumour grade is an indicator of how quickly a tumour is likely to  grow.

fields.name: tumour_grade
fields.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected. Pathological classification is based on the clinical stage information (acquired before treatment) and supplemented/modified by operative findings and pathological evaluation of the resected specimen.

fields.name: pathological_stage_group
fields.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

fields.name: pathological_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumour (T), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether or not the cancer has reached nearby lymph nodes (N), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether there are distant metastases (M), meaning spread of cancer to other parts of the body, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: percent_tumour_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of infiltration by tumour cells in a specimen.

fields.name: percent_proliferating_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the specimen.

fields.name: percent_inflammatory_tissue
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by redness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

fields.name: percent_stromal_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

fields.name: percent_necrosis
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumour specimen.

schemas.name: follow_up
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a specific follow up visit to a donor. A follow up is defined as any point of contact with a patient after diagnosis.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Unique identifier for a follow-up event in a donors clincal record, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_follow_up_id

fields.description: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the follow up date, in days.
fields.name: interval_of_followup

fields.description: Donor's disease status at time of follow-up.
fields.name: disease_status_at_followup

fields.description: Donor's relapse type if disease status at followup was progression or relapse.
fields.name: relapse_type

fields.description: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.
fields.name: relapse_interval

fields.description: Method(s) used to confirm the patient's progression disease status.
fields.name: method_of_progression_status

codeList: Biomarker in liquid biopsy (e.g. tumor marker in blood or urine)

fields.description: The anatomic site where disease progression or recurrence occurred.
fields.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at time of retreatment for recurrence or disease progression. This may be represented as rTNM in the medical report.
fields.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system
recurrence_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: recurrence_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: recurrence_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: recurrence_stage_group
fields.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting recurrence_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery.

Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery. This may be represented as ypTNM or ycTNM in the medical report.
fields.name: posttherapy_tumour_staging_system
posttherapy_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: posttherapy_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: posttherapy_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: posttherapy_stage_group
fields.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting posttherapy_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery.

schemas.name: treatment
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's treatment at a specific point in the clinical record.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.description: Type of the treatment that the donor completed.

fields.name: age_at_consent_for_treatment
fields.description: Age of patient when he/she gave their consent for the treatment.

fields.name: is_primary_treatment
fields.description: Was this is the primary treatment following the initial diagnosis?

fields.name: treatment_start_interval
fields.description: The interval between primary diagnosis and initiation of treatment, in days.

fields.name: treatment_duration
fields.description: The duration of treatment regimen, in days

fields.name: therapeutic_intent
fields.description: The therapeutic intent, the reason behind the choice of a therapy, of the treatment.

fields.name: response_to_therapy
fields.description: Donors's response to treatment.

schemas.name: chemotherapy
schemas.description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a chemotherapy treatment completed by a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: chemotherapy_drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the chemotherapy treatment regimen.

fields.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
fields.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

fields.name: cumulative_drug_dosage
fields.description: Indicate total drug dose in units specified in drug_dosage_units.

schemas.name: radiation
schemas.description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a radiation treatment completed by a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: radiation_therapy_modality
fields.description: Indicate the method of radiation treatment or modality.

fields.name: application_form
fields.description: Indicate type of radiation therapy administered.

fields.name: radiation_therapy_fractions
fields.description: Indicate the number of total fractions delivered as part of treatment.

fields.name: radiation_therapy_dosage
fields.description: Indicate the total dose given in units of Gray (Gy).

fields.name: anatomical_site_irradiated
fields.description: Indicate localization site where radiation therapy was administered.

schemas.name: hormone_therapy
schemas.description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a hormone treatment therapy completed by a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: hormone_therapy_drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the hormone therapy treatment regimen.

fields.name: hormone_drug_dosage_units
fields.description: Indicate the units used to record hormone drug dosage.

fields.name: cumulative_drug_dosage
fields.description: Indicate total drug dose in units specified in hormone_drug_dosage_units.

fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the description of a tumour based on how abnormal the tumour cells and the tumour tissue look under a microscope. Tumour grade is an indicator of how quickly a tumour is likely to  grow.

fields.name: tumour_grade
fields.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected. Pathological classification is based on the clinical stage information (acquired before treatment) and supplemented/modified by operative findings and pathological evaluation of the resected specimen.

fields.name: pathological_stage_group
fields.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

fields.name: pathological_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumour (T), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether or not the cancer has reached nearby lymph nodes (N), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether there are distant metastases (M), meaning spread of cancer to other parts of the body, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: percent_tumour_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of infiltration by tumour cells in a specimen.

fields.name: percent_proliferating_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the specimen.

fields.name: percent_inflammatory_tissue
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by redness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

fields.name: percent_stromal_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

fields.name: percent_necrosis
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumour specimen.

schemas.name: sample_registration
schemas.description: Collection of elements required to register the required Donor-Specimen-Sample data to the ARGO Platform. Registration of samples is required before genomic and clinical data submission can proceed.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Description of the donor self-reported gender. Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: specimen_tissue_source
fields.description: Tissue source of the biospecimen.

fields.name: tumour_normal_designation
fields.description: Description of the kind of specimen that was collected with respect to tumour/normal tissue origin.

codeList: Normal - tissue adjacent to primary tumour
Metastatic tumour - metastasis local to lymph node
Metastatic tumour - metastasis to distant location
Xenograft - derived from tumour cell line
Cell line - derived from xenograft tumour

fields.name: submitter_sample_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the sample, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: sample_type
fields.description: Description of the type of molecular sample used for testing.

schemas.name: donor
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in a specific ICGC-ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Donors last known state of living or deceased.
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Description of the cause of a donor's death.
fields.name: cause_of_death

fields.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
fields.name: survival_time

schemas.name: primary_diagnosis
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's primary diagnosis. The primary diagnosis is the first diagnosed case of cancer in a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: age_at_diagnosis
fields.description: Age that the donor was first diagnosed with cancer, in years.

fields.name: cancer_type_code
fields.description: The code to represent the cancer type using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2016/en#/) classification.

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at the time of primary diagnosis (prior to treatment).

fields.name: clinical_stage_group
fields.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

fields.name: stage_suffix
fields.description: If necessary, use this field to add any applicable stage suffixes. Stage suffixes may apply to certain staging systems such as Ann Arbour staging system where the four stages are divided into 4 categories (A, B, X and E).

fields.name: clinical_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: clinical_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: clinical_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

fields.name: number_lymph_nodes_examined
fields.description: The total number of lymph nodes tested for the presence of cancer.

fields.name: presenting_symptoms
fields.description: Indicate presenting symptoms at time of primary diagnosis.

fields.name: menopause_status
fields.description: Indicate the menopause status of the patient at the time of primary diagnosis.

schemas.name: specimen
schemas.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's specimen. A specimen is any material sample taken for testing, diagnostic or research purposes.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: specimen_acquisition_interval
fields.description: Interval between primary diagnosis and specimen acquisition, in days.

fields.name: anatomic_location_of_specimen_collection
fields.description: Anatomic location of a specimen when it was collected.

fields.name: central_pathology_confirmed
fields.description: Indicate whether the histologic description of tissue or cells was confirmed by a pathology review of frozen or formalin fixed slide(s) completed after the diagnostic pathology review of the tumour sample used to extract analyte(s).

fields.name: tumour_histological_type
fields.description: The code to represent the histology (morphology) of neoplasms that is usually obtained from a pathology report, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3).

fields.name: tumour_grading_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the description of a tumour based on how abnormal the tumour cells and the tumour tissue look under a microscope. Tumour grade is an indicator of how quickly a tumour is likely to  grow.

fields.name: tumour_grade
fields.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

fields.name: tumour_staging_system
fields.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected. Pathological classification is based on the clinical stage information (acquired before treatment) and supplemented/modified by operative findings and pathological evaluation of the resected specimen.

fields.name: pathological_stage_group
fields.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

fields.name: pathological_t_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumour (T), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_n_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether or not the cancer has reached nearby lymph nodes (N), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: pathological_m_category
fields.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether there are distant metastases (M), meaning spread of cancer to other parts of the body, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

fields.name: percent_tumour_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of infiltration by tumour cells in a specimen.

fields.name: percent_proliferating_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the count of proliferating cells determined during pathologic review of the specimen.

fields.name: percent_inflammatory_tissue
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by redness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

fields.name: percent_stromal_cells
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

fields.name: percent_necrosis
fields.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumour specimen.

fields.name: treatment
fields.description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's treatment at a specific point in the clinical record.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: treatment_type
fields.description: Type of the treatment that the donor completed.

fields.name: age_at_consent_for_treatment
fields.description: Age of patient when he/she gave their consent for the treatment.

fields.name: is_primary_treatment
fields.description: Was this is the primary treatment following the initial diagnosis?

fields.name: treatment_start_interval
fields.description: The interval between primary diagnosis and initiation of treatment, in days.

fields.name: treatment_duration
fields.description: The duration of treatment regimen, in days

fields.name: therapeutic_intent
fields.description: The therapeutic intent, the reason behind the choice of a therapy, of the treatment.

fields.name: response_to_therapy
fields.description: Donors's response to treatment.

fields.name: chemotherapy
fields.description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a chemotherapy treatment completed by a donor.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: chemotherapy_drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the chemotherapy treatment regimen.

fields.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
fields.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

fields.name: cumulative_drug_dosage
fields.description: Indicate total drug dose in units specified in drug_dosage_units.
